original: intros value n ts v s r. apply Terms_ind with (P := fun n ts => interpRels n r (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) ts <-> interpRels n r value (substituteTerms L n ts v s)). - simpl. reflexivity. - intros m t ts0 IH. simpl. split. + intros H. apply freeVarInterpRel with (v1 := updateValue (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) (S v0) (interpTerm (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) t)). * intros x Hx. simpl in Hx. destruct (Nat.eq_dec v x); subst. -- eapply subInterpTerm. -- reflexivity. * eapply IH. apply H. + intros H. apply freeVarInterpRel with (v1 := updateValue (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) (S v0) (interpTerm value (substituteTerm L t v s))). * intros x Hx. simpl in Hx. destruct (Nat.eq_dec v x); subst. -- eapply subInterpTerm. -- reflexivity. * eapply IH in H. apply H.
